summary: The 'Saving NASA's Workforce Act' aims to protect National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) employees from involuntary job separations. It mandates a moratorium on any reduction in force, as well as forbidding any involuntary separation of employees, until full-year appropriations for NASA for fiscal year 2026 are enacted. The bill includes exceptions for separations based on employee misconduct, delinquency, or inefficiency.
